name: Project Dark (Nick A. Spyrakos)
description:
This upload exists purely for archival purposes.

*This is a proof of concept and is not playable*

Project Dark was originally created for SAE Athens in 2019 as part of their Games Programming bachelor course as a proof of concept for an educational games framework. The goal was to teach users about dark game design patterns and malicious monetization schemes. The game never reached a working state and source files don't exist anymore. 

Through this project I explored complex management systems with inspiration drawn from Game Dev Tycoon and Reigns. The massive overscoping, limited time and non-existent resources did not allow this game to reach a working state, but it remains an idea I'd like to revisit in the future.
